content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 0, Bournemouth 1.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 0, Bournemouth 1.

Dan Gosling (Bournemouth) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Charlie Adam (Stoke City).
Attempt saved. Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Peter Crouch with a headed pass.
